# Fedbiomed client

## Installing
```bash
pip install fedbiomed-cli
```

## Adding a dataset
```bash
fedbiomed-node--add
```

## Start the node
```bash
fedbiomed-node--start-node # An automated ID will be generated
```

## Listing my data
```bash
fedbiomed-node--list
```

## Making a dataset unavailable
```bash
fedbiomed-node--delete
```

## A summary of the available commands
```bash
fedbiomed-node-h
```
